name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a highly skilled Senior Presales Engineer, I bring 8 years of experience in leveraging **cloud** technologies and **data integration** strategies to deliver insightful **analytics** across healthcare and financial sectors. My robust technical foundation includes proficiency in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with expertise in building high-performance solutions using frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**.

I possess extensive experience in effective **communication** and customer engagement, enabling me to conduct compelling **technical demonstrations** that showcase solution capabilities and align with client needs. My background in integrating advanced technologies allows me to address complex requirements, ensuring a seamless experience. Moreover, I have successfully developed and led enterprise-grade platforms incorporating AI/ML for predictive analytics and intelligent automation. This hands-on experience is complemented by my proficiency in compliance standards (HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2) and tools for machine learning pipelines such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.

Furthermore, my strong foundation in **CI/CD automation**, microservices architecture, and event-driven systems empowers me to build robust solutions that meet client expectations while enhancing operational efficiency.
